# expandable-card

## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                           | Type                                         | Default                               |
| ------------ | ------------- | ------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- |
| `buttonText` | `button-text` | Button Text                           | `string`                                     | `'Click Me'`                          |
| `buttonType` | `button-type` | Button Type                           | `"primary" \| "secondary"`                   | `'primary'`                           |
| `content`    | `content`     | Card Content                          | `string`                                     | `'This is a dynamic card component.'` |
| `expandable` | `expandable`  | Expandable Card Toggle                | `boolean`                                    | `false`                               |
| `imageUrl`   | `image-url`   | Image URL                             | `string`                                     | `''`                                  |
| `label`      | `label`       | Card Label                            | `string`                                     | `'Card Title'`                        |
| `link`       | `link`        | Link (If provided, card is clickable) | `string`                                     | `''`                                  |
| `theme`      | `theme`       | Card Theme                            | `"danger" \| "dark" \| "light" \| "primary"` | `'light'`                             |
